papers.title: Security Analysis of End-to-End Encryption for Zoom Meetings
papers.authors: Takanori Isobe, Ryoma Ito
papers.abstract: In the wake of the global COVID-19 pandemic, video conference systems have become essential for not only business purposes, but also private, academic, and educational uses. Among the various systems, Zoom is the most widely deployed video conference system. In October 2020, Zoom Video Communications rolled out their end-to-end encryption (E2EE) to protect conversations in a meeting from even insiders, namely, the service provider Zoom. In this study, we conduct thorough security evaluations of the E2EE of Zoom (version 2.3.1) by analyzing their cryptographic protocols. We discover several attacks more powerful than those expected by Zoom according to their whitepaper. Specifically, if insiders collude with meeting participants, they can impersonate any Zoom user in target meetings, whereas Zoom indicates that they can impersonate only the current meeting participants. Besides, even without relying on malicious participants, insiders can impersonate any Zoom user in target meetings though they cannot decrypt meeting streams. In addition, we demonstrate several impersonation attacks by meeting participants or insiders colluding with meeting participants. Although these attacks may be beyond the scope of the security claims made by Zoom or may be already mentioned in the whitepaper, we reveal the details of the attack procedures and their feasibility in the real-world setting and propose effective countermeasures in this paper. Our findings are not an immediate threat to the E2EE of Zoom; however, we believe that these security evaluations are of value for deeply understanding the security of E2EE of Zoom.
papers.abstract_zh: 随着全球新冠肺炎疫情的出现，视频会议系统不仅对于商业目的，而且对于私人、学术和教育用途都变得必不可少。在各种系统中，Zoom是部署最广泛的视频会议系统。2020年10月，Zoom Video Communications推出了他们的端到端加密(E2EE)，以保护会议中的对话，即使是内部人士，即服务提供商Zoom。在这项研究中，我们通过分析其加密协议，对Zoom(版本2.3.1)的E2EE进行了全面的安全性评估。根据他们的白皮书，我们发现了几种比Zoom预期的更强大的攻击。具体来说，如果内部人员与会议参与者勾结，他们可以模拟目标会议中的任何Zoom用户，而Zoom表示他们只能模拟当前的会议参与者。此外，即使不依赖恶意参与者，内部人员也可以在目标会议中冒充任何Zoom用户，尽管他们不能解密会议流。此外，我们演示了会议参与者或内部人员与会议参与者合谋进行的几个假冒攻击。虽然这些攻击可能超出了Zoom所做的安全声明的范围，或者可能已经在白皮书中提到，但我们在本文中揭示了攻击过程的细节及其在现实环境中的可行性，并提出了有效的对策。我们的发现不会对Zoom的E2EE构成直接威胁；但是，我们认为这些安全评估对于深入理解Zoom的E2EE的安全性是有价值的。
papers.title_zh: Zoom会议端到端加密的安全性分析

papers.title: SoK: Decentralized Randomness Beacon Protocols
papers.authors: Mayank Raikwar, Danilo Gligoroski
papers.abstract: . The scientiﬁc interest in the area of Decentralized Randomness Beacon (DRB) protocols has been thriving recently. Partially that interest is due to the success of the disruptive technologies introduced by modern cryptography, such as cryptocurrencies, blockchain technologies, and decentralized ﬁnances, where there is an enormous need for a public, reliable, trusted, veriﬁable, and distributed source of randomness. On the other hand, recent advancements in the development of new cryptographic primitives brought a huge interest in constructing a plethora of DRB protocols diﬀering in design and underlying primitives. To the best of our knowledge, no systematic and comprehensive work systematizes and analyzes the existing DRB protocols. Therefore, we present a Systematization of Knowledge (SoK) intending to structure the multi-faced body of research on DRB protocols. In this SoK, we delineate the DRB protocols along the following axes: their underlying primitive, properties, and security. This SoK tries to ﬁll that gap by providing basic standard deﬁnitions and requirements for DRB protocols, such as Unpredictability, Bias-resistance, Availability (or Liveness), and Public Veriﬁability. We classify DRB protocols according to the nature of interactivity among protocol participants. We also highlight the most signiﬁcant features of DRB protocols such as scalability, complexity, and performance along with a brief discussion on its improvement. We present future research directions along with a few interesting research problems.
papers.abstract_zh: 。最近，科学界对分散随机信标(DRB)协议的兴趣日益浓厚。这种兴趣部分是由于现代密码学引入的颠覆性技术的成功，如加密货币、区块链技术和分散式金融，这些技术对公开、可靠、可信、可验证和分布式随机来源有着巨大的需求。另一方面，新密码原语开发的最新进展带来了在设计和底层原语中构建大量DRB协议diﬀering的巨大兴趣。据我们所知，没有任何系统和全面的工作对现有的《DRB议定书》进行系统化和分析。因此，我们提出了一个知识系统化(SoK ),旨在构建DRB协议研究的多面体。在这篇论文中，我们沿着以下轴线描述了DRB协议:它们的底层原语、属性和安全性。该SoK试图通过提供DRB协议的基本标准定义和要求来填补这一空白，如不可预测性、抗偏性、可用性(或活性)和公共可验证性。我们根据协议参与者之间的交互性对DRB协议进行分类。我们还强调了DRB协议最重要的特性，如可扩展性、复杂性和性能，并对其改进进行了简要讨论。我们提出了未来的研究方向以及一些有趣的研究问题。
papers.title_zh: SoK:分散随机性信标协议

papers.title: Location Based Encryption
papers.authors: Tran Viet Xuan Phuong, Willy Susilo, Guomin Yang, Jun Yan, Dongxi Liu
papers.abstract: : Identity Based Encryption (IBE) is a steadily emerging ﬁeld of research in the cryptographical domain. A special ﬂavor of IBE called Location Based Encryption (LBE) includes a given location attribute to add additional access control to the encrypted entity. The main goal is to allow an entity to decrypt the ciphertext only and only if the correct location information is provided. This allows to control the access based on the position of the data user. Existing solutions for LBE make use of the conventional Global Positioning System (GPS). Though, conventional GPS solutions are known to be inﬂuenced by an artiﬁcially added error, resulting in inaccuracy of the location data. This will consequently require the LBE scheme to include a level of tolerance, as the GPS coordinates may slightly diverge between different points in time. In order to mitigate this problem by design, an alternative approach to LBE is proposed to add additional tolerance. The approach presented in this paper makes use of the What3Words location system, which offers the required tolerance for the decryption and thereby mitigating the problem of GPS inaccuracy. A following study then evaluates the real-world performance of the new encryption algorithm.
papers.abstract_zh: :基于身份的加密(IBE)是密码学领域中一个稳步发展的研究领域。IBE的一个特殊偏好是基于位置的加密(LBE ),它包括一个给定的位置属性，为加密的实体增加额外的访问控制。主要目标是仅当提供了正确的位置信息时，才允许实体解密密文。这允许基于数据用户的位置来控制访问。LBE的现有解决方案利用传统的全球定位系统(GPS)。但是，传统的GPS解决方案会受到人为误差的影响，导致位置数据不准确。因此，这将要求LBE方案包含一定程度的容差，因为GPS坐标在不同时间点之间可能会略有差异。为了通过设计来缓解这一问题，提出了一种替代LBE的方法来增加额外的容差。本文提出的方法利用What3Words定位系统，该系统提供解密所需的容差，从而减轻GPS不准确的问题。接下来的研究评估了新加密算法的真实性能。
papers.title_zh: 基于位置的加密

papers.title: Generic Anonymous Identity-Based Broadcast Encryption with Chosen-Ciphertext Security
papers.authors: Kai He, Jian Weng, Man Ho Au, Yijun Mao, Robert H. Deng
papers.abstract: . In a broadcast encryption system, a broadcaster can encrypt a message to a group of authorized receivers S and each authorized receiver can use his/her own private key to correctly decrypt the broadcast ciphertext, while the users outside S cannot. Identity-based broadcast encryption (IBBE) system is a variant of broadcast encryption system where any string representing the user’s identity (e.g., email address) can be used as his/her public key. IBBE has found many applications in real life, such as pay-TV systems, distribution of copyrighted materi-als, satellite radio communications. When employing an IBBE system, it is very important to protect the message’s conﬁdentiality and the users’ anonymity. However, existing IBBE systems cannot satisfy conﬁdentiality and anonymity simultaneously. In this paper, using an anonymous identity-based encryption (IBE) primitive with robust property as a building block, we propose a generic IBBE construction, which can simultaneously ensure the conﬁdentiality and anonymity under chosen-ciphertext attacks. Our generic IBBE construction has a desirable property that the public parameters size, the private key size and the decryption cost are constant and independent of the number of receivers.
papers.abstract_zh: 。在广播加密系统中，广播者可以对发送给一组授权接收者S的消息进行加密，每个授权接收者可以使用他/她自己的私钥对广播密文进行正确解密，而S之外的用户则不能。基于身份的广播加密(IBBE)系统是广播加密系统的变体，其中代表用户身份(例如，电子邮件地址)的任何字符串都可以用作他/她的公钥。IBBE在现实生活中有许多应用，如付费电视系统、版权材料的分发、卫星无线电通信。使用IBBE系统时，保护消息的机密性和用户的匿名性非常重要。然而，现有的IBBE系统无法同时满足身份认证和匿名性。在本文中，我们使用一个具有鲁棒性的匿名基于身份的加密(IBE)原语作为构建模块，提出了一个通用的IBBE构造，它可以在选择密文攻击下同时保证身份的真实性和匿名性。我们的通用IBBE构造具有一个期望的特性，即公共参数大小、私有密钥大小和解密成本是恒定的，并且与接收者的数量无关。

papers.title: Improved Differential Cryptanalysis on SPECK Using Plaintext Structures
papers.authors: Zhuohui Feng, Ye Luo, Chao Wang, Qianqian Yang, Zhiquan Liu, Ling Song
papers.abstract: . Plaintext structures are a commonly-used technique for improving differential cryptanalysis. Generally, there are two types of plaintext structures: multiple-differential structures and truncated-differential structures. Both types have been widely used in cryptanalysis of S-box-based ciphers while for SPECK , an Addition-Rotation-XOR (ARX) cipher, the truncated-differential structure has not been used so far. In this paper, we investigate the properties of modular addition and propose a method to construct truncated-differential structures for SPECK . Moreover, we show that a combination of both types of structures is also possible for SPECK . For recovering the key of SPECK , we propose dedicated algorithms and apply them to various differential distinguishers, which helps to obtain a series of improved attacks on all variants of SPECK . Notably, on SPECK 128, the time complexity of the attack can be reduced by a factor up to 2 15 . The results show that the combination of both structures helps to improve the data and time complexity at the same time, as in the cryptanalysis of S-box-based ciphers.
papers.title_zh: 利用明文结构对SPECK进行改进的差分密码分析
papers.abstract_zh: 。明文结构是改进差分密码分析的常用技术。一般来说，有两种类型的明文结构:多重差分结构和截断差分结构。这两种类型在基于S盒的密码的密码分析中被广泛使用，而对于SPECK，一种加法-旋转-异或(ARX)密码，截断差分结构至今还没有被使用。本文研究了模加法的性质，并提出了一种为SPECK构造截断差分结构的方法。此外，我们还证明了两种结构的组合对于SPECK也是可能的。为了恢复SPECK的密钥，我们提出了专门的算法，并将其应用于各种差分鉴别器，这有助于获得一系列针对所有SPECK变体的改进攻击。值得注意的是，在SPECK 128上，攻击的时间复杂度可以减少到2×15。结果表明，这两种结构的结合有助于同时改善数据和时间复杂度，如在基于S盒的密码分析中。

papers.title: A New Correlation Cube Attack Based on Division Property
papers.authors: Cheng Che, Tian Tian
papers.abstract: Cube attacks are an important type of key recovery attacks against NFSRbased cryptosystems. The key step in cube attacks closely related to key recovery is recovering superpolies. However, in the previous well-known cube attacks including original, division property based, and correlation cube attacks, the algebraic normal forms of superpolies could hardly be proved to be exact, which involves a small failure probability or unpractical computations. In this paper, we propose a new variant of cube attacks called deterministic cube attacks, which aims at recovering the exact algebraic normal forms of superpolies efficiently and practically. These new attacks are developed based on degree evaluation method proposed by Liu in CRYPTO2017. We apply our new cube attacks to the round-reduced Trivium. As a result, we recover the exact algebraic normal forms of some superpolies for the 818-, 819-, 837-, and 838-round Trivium. By the way, it is proved that the best cube of size 37 given by Liu in CRYPTO2017 is not a zero-sum distinguisher but a zero-biased distinguisher by recovering its exact superpoly for the first time. To the best of our knowledge, it is the first time that superpolies of cubes with the sizes less than 40 could be practically recovered for Trivium up to 838 rounds. Hopefully, our new attacks would provide some new insights on cube attacks against NFSR-based ciphers.
papers.title_zh: 一种新的基于除法性质的相关立方体攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 立方体攻击是针对基于nfsr的密码系统的一种重要的密钥恢复攻击。与密钥恢复密切相关的立方体攻击的关键步骤是恢复超级密钥。然而，在以前众所周知的立方体攻击中，包括原始的、基于分割属性的和相关的立方体攻击，很难证明超重叠的代数范式是精确的，这涉及到小的失败概率或不实际的计算。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的立方体攻击，称为确定性立方体攻击，旨在高效实用地恢复超重叠的精确代数范式。这些新的攻击是基于刘在CRYPTO2017中提出的度评估方法开发的。我们把新的立方体攻击应用于轮约化的Trivium。作为结果，我们恢复了818-，819-，837-，和838-轮Trivium的一些超重迭的精确代数范式。顺便说一句，刘在CRYPTO2017中给出的大小为37的最佳立方体不是零和区分器，而是零偏区分器，并首次恢复了它的精确超重叠。据我们所知，这是第一次，尺寸小于40的立方体的超级重叠实际上可以恢复到Trivium高达838轮。希望我们的新攻击能为基于NFSR密码的立方体攻击提供一些新的见解。

papers.title: Key Recovery Attacks on Grain-Like Keystream Generators with Key Injection
papers.authors: Matthew Beighton, Harry Bartlett, Leonie Simpson, Kenneth Koon-Ho Wong
papers.abstract: Time-memory-data (TMD) tradeoff attacks limit the security level of many classical stream ciphers (like E0, A5/1, Trivium, Grain) to 2 n, where n denotes the inner state length of the underlying keystream generator. This implies that to withstand TMD tradeoff attacks, the state size should be at least double the key size. In 2015, Armknecht and Mikhalev introduced a new line of research, which pursues the goal of reducing the inner state size of lightweight stream ciphers below this boundary by deploying a key-dependent state update function in a Grain-like stream cipher. Although their design Sprout was broken soon after publication, it has raised interest in the design principle, and a number of related ciphers have been suggested since, including Plantlet, a follow-up of Sprout, and the cipher Fruit. In this paper, existing TMD tradeoff attacks are revisited, and new insights on distinguishers and key recovery related to small-state stream ciphers are derived. A particular result is the transfer of a generic distinguishing attack suggested in 2007 by Englund, Hell, and Johansson to this new class of lightweight ciphers. Our analysis shows that the initial hope of achieving full security against TMD tradeoff attacks by continuously using the secret key has failed. In particular, we demonstrate that there are generic distinguishing attacks against Plantlet and Fruit with complexity significantly smaller than that of exhaustive key search. However, by studying the assumptions underlying the applicability of these attacks, we are able to come up with a new design idea for small-state stream ciphers which might allow to finally achieve full security against TMD tradeoff attacks. Another contribution of this paper is the first key recovery attack against the most recent version of Fruit. We show that there are at least 264 weak keys, each of which does not provide 80-bit security as promised by designers. This new attack against Fruit, together with previous attacks against Sprout, raises the question whether a more complicated key schedule than the basic one used in Plantlet is actually beneficial for the security of such ciphers.
papers.title_zh: 基于密钥注入的类颗粒密钥流生成器的密钥恢复攻击
papers.abstract_zh: 时间-内存-数据(TMD)权衡攻击将许多经典流密码(如E0、A5/1、Trivium、Grain)的安全级别限制为2 n，其中n表示底层密钥流生成器的内部状态长度。这意味着为了抵抗TMD折衷攻击，状态大小应该至少是密钥大小的两倍。2015年，Armknecht和Mikhalev引入了一个新的研究方向，通过在类颗粒流密码中部署一个依赖于密钥的状态更新功能，来实现将轻量级流密码的内部状态大小降低到该边界以下的目标。虽然他们的设计萌芽在发表后不久就被打破了，但它引起了人们对设计原则的兴趣，此后人们提出了许多相关的密码，包括幼苗、萌芽的后续和密码果实。本文回顾了现有的TMD折衷攻击，并对与小状态流密码相关的鉴别器和密钥恢复提出了新的见解。一个特别的结果是将Englund、Hell和Johansson在2007年提出的一般区分攻击转移到这种新的轻量级密码类。我们的分析表明，最初希望通过持续使用秘密密钥来实现针对TMD折衷攻击的完全安全性已经失败。特别地，我们证明了存在对幼苗和果实的一般区分攻击，其复杂度明显小于穷举密钥搜索。然而，通过研究这些攻击适用性的假设，我们能够为小状态流密码提出一种新的设计思想，这种思想可能允许最终实现对TMD折衷攻击的完全安全性。本文的另一个贡献是首次针对Fruit最新版本的密钥恢复攻击。我们发现至少有264个弱密钥，每个密钥都不能提供设计者承诺的80位安全性。这种针对水果的新攻击，加上之前针对萌芽的攻击，提出了一个问题:比在植物中使用的基本密钥表更复杂的密钥表是否真的有益于这种密码的安全性。

papers.title: Related-Cipher Attacks: Applications to Ballet and ANT
papers.authors: Yongxia Mao, Wenling Wu, Yafei Zheng, Lei Zhang
papers.title_zh: 相关密码攻击:在Ballet和ANT中的应用

papers.title: Cryptanalysis of SPEEDY
papers.authors: Jinliang Wang, Chao Niu, Qun Liu, Muzhou Li, Bart Preneel, Meiqin Wang
papers.abstract: . SPEEDY is a family of ultra-lightweight block ciphers designed by Leander et al. at CHES 2021. There are three recommended variants denoted as SPEEDY - r -192 with r ∈ { 5 , 6 , 7 } . All of them support the 192-bit block and the 192-bit key. The main focus during its design is to ensure hardware-aware low latency, thus, whether it is designed to have enough security is worth to be studied. Recently, the full-round security of SPEEDY -7-192 is announced to be broken by Boura et al. at EUROCRYPT 2023 under the chosen-ciphertext setting, where a round-reduced attack on SPEEDY -6-192 is also proposed. However, no valid attack on SPEEDY -5-192 is given due to its more restricted security parameters. Up to now, the best key recovery attack on this variant only covers 3 rounds proposed by Rohit et al. at AFRICACRYPT 2022. In this paper, we give three full-round attacks on SPEEDY -7-192. Using the divide-and-conquer strategy and other new proposed techniques, we found a 5.5-round differential distinguisher which can be used to mount the first chosen-plaintext full-round key recovery attack. With a similar strategy, we also found a 5-round linear distinguisher which leads to the first full-round attack under the known-plaintext setting. Meanwhile, the 5.5-round differential distinguisher also helps us slightly improve the full-round attack in the chosen-ciphertext setting compared with the previous result. Besides, we also present a 4-round differential attack on SPEEDY - 5-192, which is the best attack on this variant in terms of the number of rounds so far. A faster key recovery attack covering the same rounds is also given using a differential-linear distinguisher. Both attacks cannot threaten the full round security of SPEEDY -5-192.
papers.title_zh: SPEEDY的密码分析
papers.abstract_zh: 。SPEEDY是Leander等人在CHES 2021上设计的超轻量级分组密码家族。有三种推荐的变体，表示为SPEEDY - r -192，其中r ∈ { 5，6，7 }。它们都支持192位块和192位密钥。其设计的重点是确保硬件感知的低延迟，因此，它是否具有足够的安全性值得研究。最近，Boura等人在EUROCRYPT 2023上宣布在选择密文设置下破解了SPEEDY -7-192的全轮安全性，并提出了对SPEEDY -6-192的轮约化攻击。然而，由于SPEEDY -5-192的安全参数更受限制，所以没有给出对它的有效攻击。到目前为止，对该变种的最佳密钥恢复攻击仅覆盖Rohit等人在AFRICACRYPT 2022上提出的3轮。本文给出了对SPEEDY -7-192的三次全面攻击。使用分治策略和其他新提出的技术，我们发现了一个5.5轮差分鉴别器，它可用于发起第一次选择明文整轮密钥恢复攻击。利用类似的策略，我们还发现了一个5轮线性鉴别器，它导致了在已知明文设置下的第一轮攻击。同时，与以前的结果相比，5.5轮差分鉴别器也有助于我们在选择密文设置下略微改善全轮攻击。此外，我们还在SPEEDY - 5-192上提出了4轮差分攻击，这是迄今为止就轮数而言对该变体的最佳攻击。使用差分线性鉴别器，给出了覆盖相同轮次的更快的密钥恢复攻击。这两种攻击都不能威胁SPEEDY -5-192的全面安全。

papers.title: Reconsidering Generic Composition: The Modes A10, A11 and A12 are Insecure
papers.authors: Francesco Berti
papers.abstract: . Authenticated Encryption ( AE ) achieves privacy and authenticity with a single scheme. It is possible to obtain an AE scheme gluing together an encryption scheme (privacy secure) and a Message Authentication Code (authenticity secure). This approach is called generic composition and its security has been studied by Namprempre et al. [NRS14]. They looked into all the possible gluings of an encryption scheme with a secure MAC to obtain a nonce-based AE -scheme. The encryption scheme is either IV -based (that is, with an additional random input, the initialization vector [ IV ]) or nonce-based (with an input to be used once, the nonce ). Nampremepre et al. assessed the security/insecurity of all possible composition combinations except for 4 (N4, A10, A11 and A12). Berti et al. [BPP18a] showed that N4 is insecure and that the remaining modes (A10, A11, and A12) are either all secure or insecure. Here, we prove that these modes are all insecure with a counterexample.
papers.title_zh: 重新考虑一般作文:模式A10，A11和A12是不安全的
papers.abstract_zh: 。认证加密(AE)通过单一方案实现隐私和真实性。有可能获得将加密方案(隐私安全)和消息认证码(真实性安全)粘合在一起的AE方案。这种方法被称为通用组合，其安全性已由Namprempre等人进行了研究[NRS14]。他们研究了加密方案与安全MAC的所有可能的过剩，以获得基于随机数的AE-方案。加密方案或者是基于IV的(即，具有附加的随机输入，即初始化向量[ IV ])，或者是基于nonce的(具有使用一次的输入，即nonce)。Nampremepre等人评估了除4 (N4、A10、A11和A12)以外的所有可能组合的安全性/不安全性。Berti等人[BPP18a]表明N4是不安全的，其余模式(A10、A11和A12)要么都是安全的，要么都是不安全的。在这里，我们用一个反例证明了这些模式都是不安全的。

papers.title: Exploring Formal Methods for Cryptographic Hash Function Implementations
papers.authors: Nicky Mouha
papers.abstract: . Cryptographic hash functions are used inside many applica-tions that critically rely on their resistance against cryptanalysis attacks and the correctness of their implementations. Nevertheless, vulnerabilities in cryptographic hash function implementations can remain unnoticed for more than a decade, as shown by the recent discovery of a buffer overflow in the implementation of SHA-3 in the eXtended Keccak Code Package (XKCP), impacting Python, PHP, and several other software projects. This paper explains how this buffer overflow vulnerability in XKCP was found. More generally, we explore the application of formal methods to the five finalist submission packages to the NIST SHA-3 competition, allowing us to (re-)discover vulnerabilities in the implementations of Keccak and BLAKE, and also discover a previously undisclosed vulnerability in the implementation of Grøstl. We also show how the same approach rediscovers a vulnerability affecting 11 out of the 12 implemented cryptographic hash functions in Apple’s CoreCrypto library. Our approach consists of removing certain lines of code and then using KLEE as a tool to prove functional equivalence. We discuss the advantages and limitations of our approach and hope that our attempt to consolidate some earlier approaches can lead to new insights.
papers.title_zh: 探索加密哈希函数实现的形式化方法
papers.abstract_zh: 。密码散列函数被用在许多应用中，这些应用主要依赖于它们对密码分析攻击的抵抗力以及它们实现的正确性。然而，加密哈希函数实现中的漏洞可能在十多年里一直未被注意到，正如最近在扩展Keccak代码包(XKCP)的SHA-3实现中发现的缓冲区溢出所显示的那样，它影响了Python、PHP和其他几个软件项目。本文解释了如何发现XKCP中的缓冲区溢出漏洞。更一般地说，我们探索了形式方法在NIST SHA-3竞赛的五个决赛提交包中的应用，使我们能够(重新)发现Keccak和BLAKE实现中的漏洞，并且还发现了Grø stl实现中以前未公开的漏洞。我们还展示了同样的方法如何重新发现影响苹果CoreCrypto库中12个实现的加密散列函数中的11个的漏洞。我们的方法包括删除某些代码行，然后使用KLEE作为工具来证明功能等价。我们讨论了我们的方法的优点和局限性，并希望我们整合一些早期方法的尝试能够带来新的见解。

papers.title: A Tightly Secure ID-Based Signature Scheme Under DL Assumption in AGM
papers.authors: Jia-Chng Loh, Fuchun Guo, Willy Susilo, Guomin Yang
papers.abstract: . We prove adaptive security of a simple three-round threshold Schnorr signature scheme, which we call Sparkle . The standard notion of security for threshold signatures considers a static adversary – one who must declare which parties are corrupt at the beginning of the protocol. The stronger adaptive adversary can at any time corrupt parties and learn their state. This notion is natural and practical, yet not proven to be met by most schemes in the literature. In this paper, we demonstrate that Sparkle achieves several levels of security based on diﬀerent corruption models and assumptions. To begin with, Sparkle is statically secure under minimal assumptions: the discrete logarithm assumption (DL) and the random oracle model (ROM). If an adaptive adversary corrupts fewer than t/ 2 out of a threshold of t + 1 signers, then Sparkle is adaptively secure under a weaker variant of the one-more discrete logarithm assumption (AOMDL) in the ROM. Finally, we prove that Sparkle achieves full adaptive security, with a corruption threshold of t , under AOMDL in the algebraic group model (AGM) with random oracles. Importantly, we show adaptive security without requiring secure erasures. Ours is the ﬁrst proof achieving full adaptive security without exponential tightness loss for any threshold Schnorr signature scheme; moreover, the reduction is tight.
papers.title_zh: AGM中DL假设下的一个严格安全的基于身份的签名方案
papers.abstract_zh: 。我们证明了一个简单的三轮门限Schnorr签名方案的自适应安全性，我们称之为Sparkle。门限签名的标准安全概念认为是一个静态的对手——在协议开始时必须声明哪一方是腐败的。适应性更强的对手可以随时腐蚀各方并了解他们的状态。这种想法是自然的和实际的，但是文献中的大多数方案都没有证明这一点。在本文中，我们证明了基于diﬀerent腐败模型和假设，Sparkle实现了几个安全级别。首先，Sparkle在最小假设下是静态安全的:离散对数假设(DL)和随机预言模型(ROM)。如果自适应对手在t + 1个签名者的阈值中破坏少于t/ 2个签名者，那么在ROM中一个多离散对数假设(AOMDL)的较弱变体下，Sparkle是自适应安全的。最后，我们证明了Sparkle在带随机预言的代数群模型(AGM)中，在AOMDL下，达到了完全自适应安全，其破坏门限为t。重要的是，我们展示了自适应安全性，而不需要安全擦除。我们的第一个证明是，对于任何阈值Schnorr签名方案，实现了完全自适应安全性，而没有指数紧密性损失；而且，还原的比较紧。

papers.title: Quantum-Access Security of Hash-Based Signature Schemes
papers.authors: Quan Yuan, Mehdi Tibouchi, Masayuki Abe
papers.abstract: . In post-quantum cryptography, hash-based signature schemes are attractive choices because of the weak assumptions. Most existing hash-based signature schemes are proven secure against post-quantum chosen message attacks (CMAs), where the adversaries are able to execute quantum computations and classically query to the signing oracle. In some cases, the signing oracle is also considered quantum-accessible, meaning that the adversaries are able to send queries with superpositions to the signing oracle. Considering this, Boneh and Zhandry [12] propose a stronger security notion called existential unforgeability under quantum chosen message attacks (EUF-qCMA). We call it quantum-access security (or Q2 security in some literature). The quantum-access security of practical signature schemes is lacking in research, especially of the hash-based ones. In this paper, we analyze the quantum-access security of hash-based signature schemes in two directions. First, we show concrete quantum chosen message attacks (or superposition attacks) on existing hash-based signature schemes, such as SPHINCS [7] and SPHINCS+ [9]. The complexity of the attacks is obviously lower than that of optimal classical chosen message attacks, implying that quantum chosen message attacks are more threatening than classical ones to these schemes. Second, we propose a simple variant of SPHINCS+ and give security proof against quantum chosen message attacks. As far as we know, it is the first practical hash-based stateless signature scheme against quantum chosen message attacks with concrete provable security.
papers.title_zh: 基于哈希的签名方案的量子访问安全性
papers.abstract_zh: 。在后量子密码术中，基于散列的签名方案由于其弱假设而成为有吸引力的选择。大多数现有的基于散列的签名方案被证明是安全的，可以抵抗后量子选择消息攻击，在后量子选择消息攻击中，对手能够执行量子计算并经典地查询签名预言。在某些情况下，签名oracle也被认为是量子可访问的，这意味着对手能够向签名oracle发送叠加查询。考虑到这一点，Boneh和Zhandry [12]提出了一个更强的安全概念，称为量子选择消息攻击下的存在不可伪造性(EUF-qCMA)。我们称之为量子访问安全(或某些文献中的Q2安全)。实用签名方案的量子访问安全性缺乏研究，尤其是基于哈希的签名方案。本文从两个方面分析了基于哈希的签名方案的量子访问安全性。首先，我们展示了对现有的基于哈希的签名方案的具体量子选择消息攻击(或叠加攻击)，如SPHINCS [7]和SPHINCS+ [9]。攻击的复杂度明显低于最优经典选择消息攻击，这意味着量子选择消息攻击比经典选择消息攻击对这些方案的威胁更大。其次，我们提出了一个简单的SPHINCS+变体，并给出了抵抗量子选择消息攻击的安全性证明。据我们所知，这是第一个实用的基于哈希的无状态签名方案，可以抵抗量子选择消息攻击，并具有具体的可证明安全性。

papers.title: Tightly Secure Lattice Identity-Based Signature in the Quantum Random Oracle Model
papers.authors: Ernest Foo, Qinyi Li
papers.abstract: Current proxy signature schemes are mostly identity-based proxy signatures that distinguish users by identity. This signature method faces some problems, such as identity information leakage and single access control. Attribute-based proxy signature (ABPS) divides the signer’s identity information into a collection of attributes; thus, users’ identity information can be protected and access control can become fine-grained. With the development of quantum computers, the security of signature schemes based on traditional number theory problems is under threat. Therefore, we construct a new attribute-based proxy signature scheme on a lattice that can resist quantum attacks. This scheme has the properties of both attribute-based signatures and proxy signatures, i.e., fine-grained access control and strong undeniability properties. Moreover, based on the small integer solution problem (SIS), our scheme is provably secure in the random oracle model and protects the proxy signer in the adaptive security model.
papers.title_zh: 量子随机预言模型中的紧安全基于身份的格签名
papers.abstract_zh: 目前的代理签名方案大多是基于身份的代理签名，通过身份来区分用户。这种签名方式面临着身份信息泄露和单一访问控制等问题。基于属性的代理签名(ABPS)将签名者的身份信息划分为属性集合；因此，用户的身份信息可以得到保护，访问控制可以变得细粒度。随着量子计算机的发展，基于传统数论问题的签名方案的安全性受到威胁。因此，我们在格上构造了一个新的可以抵抗量子攻击的基于属性的代理签名方案。该方案同时具有基于属性的签名和代理签名的特性，即细粒度的访问控制和强不可否认性。此外，基于小整数解问题，我们的方案在随机预言模型下是可证明安全的，并在自适应安全模型下保护代理签名者。

papers.title: Ghidle: Efficient Large-State Block Ciphers for Post-quantum Security
papers.authors: Motoki Nakahashi, Rentaro Shiba, Ravi Anand, Mostafizar Rahman, Kosei Sakamoto, Fukang Liu, Takanori Isobe
papers.title_zh: Ghidle:用于后量子安全的高效大状态分组密码

papers.authors: Huiqin Chen, Yongqiang Li, Parhat Abla, Zhiran Li, Lin Jiao, Mingsheng Wang
papers.title_zh: 寻找对称密码不可能差分和零相关线性壳的量子算法

papers.title: Memory-Efficient Quantum Information Set Decoding Algorithm
papers.authors: Naoto Kimura, Atsushi Takayasu, Tsuyoshi Takagi
papers.abstract: . The syndrome decoding problem lies at the heart of code-based cryptographic constructions. Information Set Decoding (ISD) algorithms are commonly used to assess the security of these systems. The most efficient ISD algorithms rely heavily on nearest neighbor search techniques. However, the runtime result of the fastest known ISD algorithm by Both-May (PQCrypto ’17) was recently challenged by Carrier et al. (Asiacrypt ’22), which introduce themselves a new technique called RLPN decoding which yields improvements over ISD for codes with small rates k n ≤ 0 . 3. In this work we first revisit the Both-May algorithm, by giving a clean exposition and a corrected analysis. We confirm the claim by Carrier et al. that the initial analysis is flawed. However, we find that the algorithm still (slightly) improves on time complexity and significantly improves on memory complexity over previous algorithms. Our first main contribution is therefore to set the correct baseline for further improvements. As a second main contribution we then show how to improve on the Both-May algorithm, lowering the worst case running time in the full distance decoding setting to 2 0 . 0948 n . We obtain even higher time complexity gains for small rates, shifting the break even point with RLPN decoding to rate kn = 0 . 25. Moreover, we significantly improve on memory for all rates kn < 0 . 5. We obtain our improvement by introducing a novel technique to combine the list construction step and the list filtering step commonly applied by ISD algorithms. Therefore we treat the nearest neighbor routine in a non-blackbox fashion which allows us to embed the filtering into the nearest neighbor search. In this context we introduce the fixed-weight nearest neighbor problem, and propose a first algorithm to solve this problem. Besides resulting in an improved decoding algorithm this opens the direction for further improvements, since any faster algorithm for solving this fixed-weight nearest neighbor variant is likely to lead to further improvements of our ISD algorithm.
papers.title_zh: 高效存储的量子信息集解码算法
papers.abstract_zh: 。伴随式解码问题是基于代码的密码构造的核心。信息集解码(ISD)算法通常用于评估这些系统的安全性。最有效的ISD算法严重依赖最近邻搜索技术。然而，Both-May (PQCrypto '17)的已知最快ISD算法的运行时间结果最近受到Carrier等人(Asiacrypt '22)的挑战，他们介绍了一种称为RLPN解码的新技术，该技术对小速率k n ≤ 0的代码产生了优于ISD的改进。3.在这项工作中，我们首先通过给出一个清晰的阐述和一个正确的分析，重新审视了双梅算法。我们确认开利等人的说法，即最初的分析是有缺陷的。然而，我们发现该算法仍然(稍微)改善了时间复杂度，并且显著改善了先前算法的存储复杂度。因此，我们的第一个主要贡献是为进一步改进设定正确的基准。作为第二个主要贡献，我们展示了如何改进Both-May算法，将全距离解码设置中的最坏情况运行时间降低到2 0。对于小速率，我们获得了甚至更高的时间复杂度增益，将RLPN解码的平衡点移动到速率kn = 0。25.此外，对于所有速率kn < 0，我们都显著提高了内存。5.我们通过引入一种新颖的技术来组合ISD算法通常应用的列表构建步骤和列表过滤步骤，从而获得我们的改进。因此，我们以非黑盒方式处理最近邻例程，这允许我们将过滤嵌入到最近邻搜索中。在这种情况下，我们介绍了固定权重的最近邻问题，并提出了解决这个问题的第一个算法。除了导致改进的解码算法之外，这为进一步的改进打开了方向，因为用于求解这个固定权重的最近邻变量的任何更快的算法都可能导致我们的ISD算法的进一步改进。

papers.title: CSI-SharK: CSI-FiSh with Sharing-friendly Keys
papers.authors: Shahla Atapoor, Karim Baghery, Daniele Cozzo, Robi Pedersen
papers.abstract: . CSI-FiSh is one of the most efficient isogeny-based signature schemes, which is proven to be secure in the Quantum Random Oracle Model (QROM). However, there is a bottleneck in CSI-FiSh in the threshold setting, which is that its public key needs to be generated by using k − 1 secret keys. This leads to very inefficient threshold key generation protocols and also forces the parties to store k − 1 secret shares. We present CSI-SharK, a new variant of CSI -FiSh that has more Shar ing-friendly K eys and is as efficient as the original scheme. This is accomplished by modifying the public key of the ID protocol, used in the original CSI-FiSh, to the equal length Structured Public Key (SPK), generated by a single secret key, and then proving that the modified ID protocol and the resulting signature scheme remain secure in the QROM. We translate existing CSI-FiSh-based threshold signatures and Distributed Key Generation (DKG) protocols to the CSI-SharK setting. We find that DKG schemes based on CSI-SharK outperform the state-of-the-art actively secure DKG protocols from the literature by a factor of about 3, while also strongly reducing the communication cost between the parties. We also uncover and discuss a flaw in the key generation of the actively secure CSI-FiSh based threshold signature scheme Sashimi , that can prevent parties from signing. Finally, we discuss how (distributed) key generation and signature schemes in the isogeny setting are strongly parallelizable and we show that by using C independent CPU threads, the total runtime of such schemes can basically be reduced by a factor C . As multiple threads are standard in modern CPU archi-tecture, this parallelizability is a strong incentive towards using isogeny-based (distributed) key generation and signature schemes in practical scenarios.
papers.title_zh: CSI-SharK:带有共享友好密钥的CSI-FiSh
papers.abstract_zh: 。CSI-FiSh是最有效的基于同源的签名方案之一，在量子随机预言模型中被证明是安全的。但是CSI-FiSh在阈值设置上有一个瓶颈，就是它的公钥需要用k1个秘密密钥生成。这导致非常低效的门限密钥生成协议，并且还迫使各方存储k1秘密份额。我们提出了CSI-SharK，它是CSI -FiSh的一个新变种，具有更多沙尔山友好的密钥，并且与原始方案一样有效。这是通过将原始CSI-FiSh中使用的ID协议的公钥修改为由单个密钥生成的等长结构化公钥(SPK ),然后证明修改后的ID协议和得到的签名方案在QROM中保持安全来实现的。我们将现有的基于CSI-FiSh的门限签名和分布式密钥生成(DKG)协议转化为CSI-SharK协议。我们发现，基于CSI-SharK的DKG方案比文献中现有的主动安全DKG协议的性能提高了约3倍，同时大大降低了各方之间的通信成本。我们还发现并讨论了主动安全的基于CSI-FiSh的门限签名方案的密钥生成中的一个缺陷，该缺陷会阻止各方进行签名。最后，我们讨论了同源设置中的(分布式)密钥生成和签名方案是如何强并行化的，并且我们表明，通过使用独立于C的CPU线程，这种方案的总运行时间基本上可以减少C倍。由于多线程是现代CPU架构中的标准，这种并行性是在实际场景中使用基于同源的(分布式)密钥生成和签名方案的强大动力。

papers.title: Practical Verifiable Random Function with RKA Security
papers.authors: Tsz Hon Yuen, Shimin Pan, Sheng Huang, Xiaoting Zhang
papers.abstract: Verifiable random function is a powerful function that provides a noninteractively public verifiable proof for its output. Recently, verifiable random function has found essential applications in designing secure consensus protocols in blockchain. How to construct secure and practical verifiable random functions has also attracted more and more attention. In this paper, we propose a practical anonymous verifiable random function. Security proofs show that the proposed anonymous verifiable random function achieves correctness, anonymity, uniqueness, and pseudorandomness. In addition, we show a concrete application of our proposed anonymous verifiable random function in blockchain to improve the consensus mechanism for Hyperledger fabric. Finally, we implement the proposed anonymous verifiable random function and evaluate its performance. Test results show that the proposed anonymous verifiable random function supports faster computing operations and has a smaller proof size.
papers.title_zh: 具有RKA安全性的实用可验证随机函数
papers.abstract_zh: 可验证随机函数是一个强大的函数，它为其输出提供非交互式的公共可验证证明。最近，在区块链，可验证随机函数在设计安全共识协议中得到了重要的应用。如何构造安全实用的可验证随机函数也越来越受到关注。本文提出了一个实用的匿名可验证随机函数。安全性证明表明，所提出的匿名可验证随机函数具有正确性、匿名性、唯一性和伪随机性。此外，我们展示了我们提出的匿名可验证随机函数在区块链的具体应用，以改进超分类帐结构的一致性机制。最后，我们实现了所提出的匿名可验证随机函数，并对其性能进行了评估。测试结果表明，所提出的匿名可验证随机函数支持更快的计算操作，并且具有更小的证明规模。

papers.title: Statistically Consistent Broadcast Authenticated Encryption with Keyword Search - Adaptive Security from Standard Assumptions
papers.authors: Sayantan Mukherjee
papers.title_zh: 具有关键字搜索的统计一致广播认证加密-来自标准假设的自适应安全性

papers.title: Modular Design of KEM-Based Authenticated Key Exchange
papers.authors: Colin Boyd, Bor de Kock, Lise Millerjord
papers.abstract: A key encapsulation mechanism (KEM) is a basic building block for key exchange which must be combined with long-term keys in order to achieve authenticated key exchange (AKE). Although several KEM-based AKE protocols have been proposed, KEM-based modular building blocks are not available. We provide a KEM-based authenticator and a KEM-based protocol in the Authenticated Links model ( AM ), in the terminology of Canetti and Krawczyk (2001). Using these building blocks we achieve a set of generic AKE protocols. By instantiating these with post-quantum secure primitives we are able to propose several new post-quantum secure AKE protocols.
papers.title_zh: 基于KEM的认证密钥交换的模块化设计
papers.abstract_zh: 密钥封装机制(KEM)是密钥交换的基本构件，它必须与长期密钥相结合才能实现认证密钥交换(AKE)。尽管已经提出了几个基于KEM的AKE协议，但是基于KEM的模块化构建块还不可用。在卡内蒂和科劳兹克(2001)的术语中，我们在认证链接模型(AM)中提供了基于KEM的认证器和基于KEM的协议。使用这些构件，我们实现了一套通用的AKE协议。通过用后量子安全原语实例化这些协议，我们能够提出几个新的后量子安全AKE协议。

papers.title: Reusable, Instant and Private Payment Guarantees for Cryptocurrencies
papers.authors: Akash Madhusudan, Mahdi Sedaghat, Samarth Tiwari, Kelong Cong, Bart Preneel
papers.abstract: . Despite offering numerous advantages, public decentralized cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin suffer from scalability issues such as high transaction latency and low throughput. The vast array of so-called Layer-2 solutions tackling the scalability problem focus on throughput, and consider latency as a secondary objective. However, in the context of retail payments, instant finality of transactions is arguably a more pressing concern, besides the overarching concern for privacy. In this paper, we provide an overlay network that allows privacy-friendly low latency payments in a retail market. Our approach follows that of a recent work called Snappy, which achieved low latency but exposed identities of customers and their transaction histories. Our construction ensures this data is kept private, while providing merchants with protection against double-spending attacks. Although our system is still based upon customers registering with a collateral, crucially this collateral is reusable over time. The technical novelty of our work comes from randomness-reusable threshold encryption (RRTE), a cryptographic primitive we designed specifically for the following features: our construction provably guarantees payments to merchants, preserves the secret identity of honest customers and prevents their transactions from being linked. We also present an implementation of our construction, showing its capacity for fast global payments in a retail setting with a delay of less than 1 second.
papers.title_zh: 加密货币的可重复使用、即时和私人支付保证
papers.abstract_zh: 。尽管提供了许多优势，但公共分散加密货币(如比特币)存在可扩展性问题，如高交易延迟和低吞吐量。解决可伸缩性问题的大量所谓的第2层解决方案集中于吞吐量，并将延迟视为次要目标。然而，在零售支付的背景下，除了对隐私的首要关注之外，交易的即时终结可以说是一个更紧迫的问题。在本文中，我们提供了一个覆盖网络，允许在零售市场中进行隐私友好的低延迟支付。我们的方法遵循了最近一项名为Snappy的工作，该工作实现了低延迟，但暴露了客户的身份及其交易历史。我们的构建确保了这些数据的私密性，同时为商家提供了防止重复消费攻击的保护。尽管我们的系统仍然基于注册了宣传材料的客户，但重要的是，随着时间的推移，这些宣传材料可以重复使用。我们工作的技术新颖性来自随机性-可重用阈值加密(RRTE)，这是一种我们专门为以下功能设计的加密原语:我们的构造可证明地保证了对商家的支付，保留了诚实客户的秘密身份，并防止他们的交易被链接。我们还展示了我们的构造的实现，展示了它在零售环境中以小于1秒的延迟进行快速全球支付的能力。

papers.title: BinAlign: Alignment Padding Based Compiler Provenance Recovery
papers.authors: Maliha Ismail, Yan Lin, DongGyun Han, Debin Gao
papers.title_zh: BinAlign:基于对齐填充的编译器出处恢复

papers.title: Encrypted Network Traffic Classification with Higher Order Graph Neural Network
papers.authors: Zulu Okonkwo, Ernest Foo, Zhe Hou, Qinyi Li, Zahra Jadidi
papers.abstract: The Internet is about to enter the era of full encryption. Traditional traffic classification methods only work well in non-encrypted environments. How to identify the specific types of network encrypted traffic in an encrypted environment without decryption is one of the foundations for maintaining cyberspace security. Traffic classification based on machine learning relies heavily on the prior knowledge of experts to construct feature sets. Although traffic classification based on deep learning can reduce human intervention, it requires a large amount of labeled data for parameter determination. This paper proposes a tCLD-Net model that combines transfer learning and deep learning. It can be trained on a small amount of labeled data to distinguish network encrypted traffic with a high accuracy. It pre-trains a CLD-Net model in the source domain data set, and fixes the parameters of the convolutional neural network module in it, and trains and tests it in the target domain data set. In order to verify the effectiveness of the tCLD-Net model, we use the ISCX public data set to conduct experiments. The results show that our proposed model can complete 100 epoches training in 208 seconds when the training set only occupies 20% of the target domain. And achieve a classification accuracy rate about 86%. This is 4% higher than the model without pre-training, and the training time is only one third of the model without pre-training.
papers.title_zh: 基于高阶图神经网络的加密网络流量分类
papers.abstract_zh: 互联网即将进入全加密时代。传统的流量分类方法仅在非加密环境中工作良好。如何在不解密的情况下，在加密环境下识别特定类型的网络加密流量，是维护网络空间安全的基础之一。基于机器学习的流量分类严重依赖于专家的先验知识来构建特征集。基于深度学习的流量分类虽然可以减少人为干预，但需要大量的标注数据进行参数确定。提出一种结合迁移学习和深度学习的tCLD-Net模型。它可以在少量标记数据上训练，以高准确度区分网络加密流量。它在源域数据集中预训练一个CLD网模型，并在其中固定卷积神经网络模块的参数，在目标域数据集中进行训练和测试。为了验证tCLD-Net模型的有效性，我们使用ISCX公开数据集进行实验。结果表明，当训练集仅占目标域的20%时，我们提出的模型可以在208秒内完成100个epoches的训练。分类准确率达到86%左右。这比没有预训练的模型提高了4%，训练时间只有没有预训练的模型的三分之一。
